Register.agreedToS: I have read and agreed to Terms of Service
Register.alreadyHaveAccount: If you already have an account, <link>you can log in here.</link>

validate.tos: You must agree to the terms of use.
validate.password: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

Register.checkUserNameError: Could not check user name because of a server error.
Register.signupError: Could not create the user account because of a server error.
Register.checkYourEmail: Check your email to confirm your account.

ResetPassword.title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.resetPasswordError: Password could not be reset because of a server error.
ResetPassword.checkYourEmail: Check your email to reset your password.

UpdatePassword.title: Update Password
UpdatePassword.unavailableMessage: Password update request cannot be initiated. The request may have expired. If you need to reset your password, <link>click here</link>!

validate.password: Password must be at least 8 characters long

UpdatePassword.passwordShouldBeDifferentError: New password should be different from the old password.
UpdatePassword.serverError: Password could not be updated because of a server error.

Confirm.successMessage: Your email has been confirmed. Your user profile still must be reviewed and approved by an admin. <link>Click here</link> to see your profile status.
Confirm.authFlowWarningMessage: It looks like you're trying to complete a registration process, but you're not signed in. Try to open the confirmation link in the original browser.
Confirm.noCodeWarningMessage: Could not confirm your account. Be sure to follow the confirmation link in your email.

AuthCodeError.title: Authentication Error
AuthCodeError.message: We encountered an issue while verifying your authentication code. This might have happened due to an expired verification link.

DeleteAccountPage.cautionMessage: You are about to delete your user account. Your personal information and user profile will be removed from the service.
DeleteAccountPage.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred while trying to delete your account.
DeleteAccountPage.successMessage: Your user account has been deleted from the service.
